entry.data:
CLOUDY
PATCHY FOG THIS MORNING
RAIN LIKELY, MAINLY THIS MORNING
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE UPPER 40S THIS AFTERNOON
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH THIS AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS AROUND 40
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW IN THE EVENING, THEN SNOW AFTER MIDNIGHT
LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
CHANCE OF SNOW 90 PERCENT

CLOUDY
SNOW AND FREEZING RAIN LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF SNOW IN THE AFTERNOON
NEW LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF FREEZING RAIN AND SNOW IN THE MORNING, THEN RAIN, FREEZING RAIN AND SNOW LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION POSSIBLE
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
RAIN, FREEZING RAIN AND SNOW LIKELY IN THE EVENING
NEW LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
LOWS AROUND 20

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
